about_me_1: Hello, my name is Islom Alixujaev, I am 17 years old. I live in Yangiyol, Tashkent region.
about_me_2: I have been writing code for 1.5 years. In August last year, I graduated from the Front end of the Proweb training center. After that, I studied at the MERN stack course on the Mohirdev Online Platform.
about_me_3: I have 3 months internship experience. My goal is to gain more experience and work with a better team.
portfolio_desc: A small gallery of recent projects chosen by me. Unfortunately, there are no real projects among them yet. One of my future intentions is to do bigger real projects.
proweb_desc: In December 2020, I started taking a web programming course at the Proweb Learning Center. During the 9 months of study, I learned the basics of Front End. Our teacher 'Ziyod aka' taught us a lot of useful knowledge. In September 2020, I graduated from the Proweb Training Center.
mohir_desc: After graduating from the Proweb Learning Center in September 2021, I purchased the MERN stack course from the Mohirdev online platform to learn React Js. In that course, I learned complex technologies such as Javascript, ReactJs, NextJs, NodeJs, ExpressJs, MongoDB, TypeScript. Our teacher Samar Badriddinov from Mohirdev, who helped me a lot to learn this, is very important. In March 2022, I completed the MERN stack course. From now on, I will continue to learn more and more information through the You Tube platform.
